class ghostGLActionObject

Base class for action objects such as the pinch transform.

From header file: ghostGLActionObject.h

Constructors and Destructors
~ghostGLActionObject
ghostGLActionObjectConstructor is protected because it is not meaningful to instantiate a ghostGLActionObject, only objects derived from it.
Functions
getGLManager Accessor.
setGLManager Assign new manager.
Virtual Functions
removeRemove is called when ghostGLManager::removeActionObject() is called on this object.
postDisplayCalled after each display iteration.
preDisplayCalled before each display iteration.
Data Members
protected
ghostGLManager* m_glManager;Pointer to our manager.
